website_summaries.verdict: The Avia Avi-Solstice captured the interests of many enthusiasts due to its plush cushioning and pleasing appearance. Despite its positive qualities, the running footgear still received opposing views regarding the comfort and support it brought. While a handful confirmed that the shoe was comfortable in every aspect, there were some who thought against the grain. Overall, the footgear was still validated as a runner-up for being one of the most reliable training shoes on the market.
pros: Plenty of consumers applauded the Avia Avi-Solstice because of its fashionable design
Some users admired the shoe for its cushioning, which made them feel like they were wearing memory gel inserts
Several buyers were impressed by how comfortable the sneaker was
The footgear was thought to be durable according to a couple of reviewers
A wearer commended the footwear for the right amount of arch support
cons: A meager count of users felt let down by the footgear due to the insufficient arch support
The Avia Avi-Solstice seemed to lack cushion as per one consumer
A few purchasers complained about the shoelaces not being adjustable

customer_reviews.title: Faux  Elastic Shoe Laces
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable shoes. I wish I could tighten the "shoe laces" a little, but they are elastics bands with the look of shoe laces: Just insert your feet into them. They would be perfect for someone who cannot tie shoes because of extreme stiffness or a disability. I am not sure if they would work as running shoes: I personally like to adjust sneaker tightness to prevent rubbing and these cannot be tightened/adjusted. I will need to install regular shoe laces. Update: I have tightened the elastic laces on the top and have been wearing them for long walks as well as driving; they are super comfy and soft!
customer_reviews.author: NaT

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I've only had these for 24 hours, so I'll update in a month or two, but so far these are great! I've worn them on a couple different surfaces for several hours at a time and so far, so good. Good support, no pinching or rubbing. They look nice too - I don't feel like I have Frankenstein feet in them. Seem to be well-made. Time will tell on that.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are VERY comfortable... so comfortable these are my 3rd pair. The fabric is elastic so they stretch to fit wide feet comfortably. They are flexible and lightweight... more comfortable than expensive sneakers. Taking away a star for the fixed lace. I wish they were standard/adjustable. I tie a knot to make them a little tighter.
customer_reviews.author: LOM

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Pretty good support, like the best you could do without getting bulky sketchers. These shoes do not have the plastic in the heel like other shoes so they will not be ruined if you slip them on and are stepping on the back of the shoe like a slipper. This is my 3rd pair of this type and 4th pair of avia brand. Still happy. A good everyday shoe. I have bad feet, arch issues so I wear shoe inserts in all my shoes. These shoes have enough space for that.
customer_reviews.author: Tavia Vice

customer_reviews.title: Looks wide on, fits narrow across the toes.
customer_reviews.text: These slip on nicely and are decent quality, but the fit is weird. They look very wide on; but they rubbed the outside of my pinky and 4th toe quite uncomfortably narrow. I don't have wide feet, just normal. If your feet across the toes are narrow, these should be great. Cute color.
customer_reviews.author: greetings

customer_reviews.title: super comfy, super lightweight, good for walking
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3 pairs of these shoes. They're really lightweight, and very comfy even with my high arches. I regularly walk 3+ miles a day and these are holding up nicely. Other shoes I'll wear for 1-2 days then need to switch because my feet will start aching but I haven't noticed that with these shoes. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Not a good Fit wore em to work one day worst shoe ever I couldnt wear em again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got a size 11 in women's thinking they would fit since I usually wear a size 10 or 9 and a half depending on how the shoe was made. I wore em to work and I have a physical job on my feet, so my feet swell, and these fit like a 9 or so. So uncomfortable my toes were cramped. They were awful & fit poorly and I couldnt wear em again. F- will not purchase these again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J Gandy

customer_reviews.title: Yeah ... maybe not
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! A little on the narrow size, but workable. My back and knees really enjoyed these. I walk about 5 miles a day in a 26k store. Three, yes 3, days of work and these shoes quit. If you've got a narrow foot and dont plan to make your shoes just as hard as you do, then buy em. Otherwise, move on to a different shoe.
customer_reviews.author: gophfferkitty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I travel for work and find these to be perfect. They are light weight. Slip on and off easily at the airport. I have several pairs. I purchased my first pair at Kohls for much more money so was thrilled to find them on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Brady

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fairly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run small, so order at least a half size up. They are really cute. Probably not the most supportive or super well-made, but for the price, they are nice and seem comfortable. I bought them to wear on a cruise with summer shorts and white jeans. Looking forward to wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs retired

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them.
customer_reviews.text: At a doctors visit we saw the nurse wearing a pair of what we thought were Asics. Turns out they were Avias and the nurse raved about them. Got a pair for my wife. Look good, very soft, she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: oibv305

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a 10 year old. Got 6 1/2 and they fit soooo small. She’s 10! And a 6 1/2 is too small. Might try a 7 and then I’m giving up. She wears 6 with room normally. Perhaps it was this particular pair IDK
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: A little short
customer_reviews.text: Found it to be a little shorter than all the other Avia shoes I have purchased. The heel was a litle loose due to the style of the shoe. Ties were not adjustable nor high enough up my foot. This does not take anything away from the product; it is something I will watch more closely in my ordering
customer_reviews.author: Texlady

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is our school color. We wear blue every Thursday we are Panthers and it is Pan-thursday. I now wear my new blue shoes with my shirt. PERFECT color and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Cammie Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, super comfortable. Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers. Super lightweight. No break in time required. Look great lots of complements. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Noneonrecord

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Shoes-great fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice but they squeak. Every time I wear them they have a squeaky sound and everyone around can hear it too. Never had a pair of shoes like this. I would love to buy more but since they have this issue No way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: These were cute shoes. And comfortable. But they were really roomy through the toes and a bit too big. I usually wear an 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Browndorf

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight shoe. Will be curious to see how the synthetic sole wears, but otherwise comfy and stylish. Don't understand why there's such a price difference in colors though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love love bought 2 pair. Completely worth it light weight comfortable. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers would be very comfortable if they ran true to size. They are very light and airy. I usually wear an 8 - 8.5 and I ordered the 8.5 and they were still too small.
customer_reviews.author: Biker

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not perfect for wide toe box
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and appearance, but the arch support is poor. And even though the top is a stretchy looking mesh, the inside of the shoe has a much less flexible lining, and the shoes put pressure on my little toes.
customer_reviews.author: MadHatter

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.  Like wearing slippers.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and comfortable. The only thing I don’t like is they suction to the floor when you walk. Makes a weird noise.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Sofia

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit of this shoe, lots of toe room. It is very light weight and I can wear it without socks if I choose.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: IT was a gift for My Wife
customer_reviews.text: She loved them and I'm good (safe) for another year...lol!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Cartagena

customer_reviews.title: ... they fit her just right and they are a super nice tennis
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom and they fit her just right and they are a super nice tennis, I think I'm going to order me a pair they are super nice. :)
customer_reviews.author: Diane T

customer_reviews.title: Love My Avia
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! The most comfortable pair I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: ijojo

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are adorable and comfy and fit better than I expected. For me, they run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, light weight, excellent price. Received before the expected date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable. Affordable price. Right shoe is a bit dirty straight from the box.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them. She's had them on since ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. She's had them on since Christmas morning:).
customer_reviews.author: Vette

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I love the breathing feel and the colors look good together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good support and great for walking and running
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, soft stretch outer fabric, light weight, good support and great for walking and running around
customer_reviews.author: Janis Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: They fit great but the elastic shoe laces I do not like. I replaced them with regular laces and are much better. Comfy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Elastic shoe strings
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfy but didn't realize that the shoe strings are just elastic so they slip on, which is great but do get a bit tight as the day goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Zavora19

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Fit well.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the subdued color blend of navy and purple. I also like slip ons with fake laces.
customer_reviews.author: alia

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT i EXPECTED.
customer_reviews.text: THEY ARE JUST NOT WHAT i EXPECTED PLUS THEY WERE DENTED ONE TOE.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for everyday! Great comfort and support! Love that you can slip them on fast and run out the door!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D Caswell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight shoe. It was not quite as comfy as I expected. There could be more padding on the footbed.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny P.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Great comfort but the soles don't last long as other sneakers. (Not the first time I've had these).
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Koutlas

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than others of the size 11. Returned for credit. Successfully
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The Avia shoes are very comfortable, fit great, for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! The fit is great for me but I do have narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Bier

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: I think these run a tad small. Not quite a half size but go toward your bigger size if questionable
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: SOOOO comfortable!! I have bad feet (high arch) and these shoes really help.
customer_reviews.author: Cristie Willms

product_meta.title: Avia Women's Avi-Solstice Sneaker
product_meta.description: Minimalist design lines with lightweight air mesh combined with avia's cantilever technology for cushioning, stability and shock absorption. Avi-solstice will deliver comfort and energy for your all-day active life.
feature_bullets: Molded EVA with Cantilever for cushioning and stability
